body.name: Floor Mop and Bucket Set with 2 Washable Microfiber Pads, Wet and Dry use, Home Floor Cleaning System for All Floor Types and Windows (White)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 7 hrs 58 mins
features: 2-in-1 floor mop and bucket set: The floor mop set includes a mop head and a mop bucket, both made of high-quality microfiber. The mop head is designed with a soft and absorbent microfiber cloth, which can effectively clean dust, dirt, pet hair, and other debris from various types of floors, including hardwood, laminate, tile, and carpet. The mop bucket has a large capacity, allowing you to clean an entire room without the need for frequent refills.

Wet and dry use: The floor mop is suitable for both wet and dry cleaning. When used with water, it can effectively remove stubborn stains, dirt, and grime, leaving your floors spotless. When used dry, it can pick up small particles and dust, making it ideal for daily cleaning and maintenance.

Easy to assemble and use: The floor mop is easy to assemble and use. The mop head can be easily attached or detached from the mop handle, and the handle is ergonomically designed for comfortable grip. The mop bucket has a sturdy handle and a leak-proof design, making it easy to carry and pour water.

Multi-functional mop: The floor mop is not only suitable for cleaning floors, but also for cleaning windows, ceilings, and other hard-to-reach areas. The mop head can be twisted and adjusted to fit different angles, allowing you to reach every corner of your home.

Heavy-duty floor mop: The floor mop is made of durable materials, including a strong metal frame and a high-quality microfiber cloth. It is designed to withstand heavy use, making it ideal for cleaning floors in commercial or industrial settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product!
reviews.reviewText: I really appreciate the ease with which this moves and turns. Takes no time to mop your floors and bucket separates clean and dirty water. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Worked great, one time.The pockets that hold the end of the mop pad ripped out during the first use. Not sturdy at all. Good concept, poor quality for the simplest piece of the mop system.Also, no directions included. I had to pull the item back up on Amazon to figure out how to use it. Definitely not worth the money for this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: It’s a little flimsy , but it does as advertised. The only issue is when u drain of the water on the dry side, it pushes the dirty water into the clean water . So it kinda defeats the purpose of having clean water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I do not recommend this product. It is very flimsy, feels like it will break upon use. It did not come with any sort of instructions or information on how to assemble it so there's a bit of guess work and hoping for the best involved. The picture and description gave the impression that the dirty water and the "clean-ish" start separate but they don't. At all. So you end up just kinda smearing dirt back all over your floor unless you're gonna make multiple trips to your water source. And speaking of the picture, if all this isn't enough, the item I received is not the same item in the picture. It's similar but not the same. Terribly misleading.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mop/bucket set looked appealing for its compact size and the idea of being able to squeegee the dirty water from the mop pad directly into the bucket.The idea is still a good one, but there are design flaws that make it quite awkward to use.The mop itself is a swiffer-type design. It comes with two reusable pads that attach with a slide-on then Velcro attachment. It won’t scrub, but it is fine for quick, light mopping.The problem arises when you try to use the bucket. The mop head must fold completely flat to be inserted into the bucket, and that only works in one direction. If you insert it without folding it in the right direction (almost flat but not quite) the mop head catches on the inside and gets stuck. You then have to remove the lid, turn the mop, fold it the other way, and then you can remove it from the lid of the bucket.Sound confusing and awkward. Yeah. It really is.I don’t think they should give up on this idea, but as it is- it’s more trouble than it’s worth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great, compact mop. I love that I can clean the mop pad during use by simply inserting it into the bucket. I also love that the pads are washable. It all fits nicely in the bucket when not in use. I love the color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Does NOT look like advertised
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to mop my walls. Can’t even use it yet due to the bucket not having plugs to keep the water in. Significantly smaller than you’d imagine, and does not look like the one pictured by any means. I’m waiting to use this since I now need a replacement. Hoping I’m not waiting for no reason and this doesn’t even work.
